availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carrollton, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Married Nancy Hanks. Father of Cyrus Hanks, William T. Hanks, Dudley S. Hanks, and Atha Hanks. Merchant in Carrollton in 1850. Merchants clerk in Carrollton in 1860. Clerk of the Carroll County Court in 1862.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Carrollton District No. 2, p. 4; Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District No. First, p. 157 B; KYR-0001-004-0032; Find A Grave, "Allen Hanks (1814 - 1872)," Memorial #31679597, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=31679597 (accessed October 5, 2017).
